name: Intro
_source: s;Alina;This is why you called me here?
s;Professor;Do not act surprised. Your first offense did not happen just now!|You have a consistent pattern of misbehavior!
s;Alina;Misbehavior? I impressed a panel of judges!|That was a magical showcase, what else was I supposed to do?

s;Professor;...I should not have expected you to understand.|Mr. Cibiades parents have provided an extensive donation,|contingent upon their son's success.|That was his competition to win.|Do you comprehend?
s;Alina;So my crime is being a better mage?|On Thanatos, I won't conceal my talents on behalf of a snob!
s;Professor;Very well. If you will not cease, I will force you out.
s;Alina;How? Gonna file a petition against me?|I've done nothing wrong!
s;Professor;No, I will expel you through the means befitting your station.
s;Simon;Armed men! Please, get behind me!
s;Librarian;A-armed men! In this library?|In MY library?{w} Why...
s;Simon;Are there guards we can call?
s;Librarian;N-n-no! This has never happened before!|At least not during work hours.
s;Simon;You have no need to fear.{w} We'll clear your library of these bandits.
s;Librarian;You must be careful!|This place contains many books of power...
s;Mitzi;Could it be...?{w} What a turn of fortune!|I must have those tomes!|Forget the girl if needed,|I see original manuscripts!
s;Alina;What did I do?{w} Every time I try, someone always...
s;Alina;I've had enough.{w} I won't stay silent any more. I'm done.|Done with these scoundrels and snobs and... all of this.
